input_text:
Job Title: PRODUCTION SUPERVISOR

Location: Rolla, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Summary

Company is in search of a Production Supervisor within the Rolla MO area. Candidates that are interested should have 3-5 years of supervisory experience in a manufacturing environment. An Associate degree is preferred. Experience in the packaging and /or pulp and paper industry is preferred. Company is seeking candidates with experience with automation.

Candidates must have demonstrated leadership and change management skills. Proven Continuous Improvement experience (CI) along with a firm understanding of safety regulations including OSHA, SARA, and HAZWOPER. This position is 3rd shift 7PM-7AM. Relocation assistance is available! If you are interested in this position please apply today!

location: Rolla, Missouri

job type: Permanent

salary: $60,000 - 75,000 per year

work hours: 10pm to 7am

education: Associates

Responsibilities

Leads team of 35+ hourly associates with varying levels of experience and education; develops and coaches individuals and the team to solve operational issues; motivates the team to achieve performance goals Responsible for area-specific production process management and improvement activities including identification and communication of opportunity areas, meeting daily production goals, and identification and execution of planned improvements Knows, understands, communicate and facilities a safe work culture, ensuring compliance with all company safety/environmental and housekeeping policies Recommend major process or procedure changes and improvements to Production Manager and implement agreed changes Monitor employee performance to assure that quality and production standards are met and assists in completing performance reviews Complete reports for review and analysis of operating conditions Monitor production process; taking corrective measures if needed Ensure workers are trained to adequately perform assigned tasks and equipment Encourage and aide in the development of employees

Qualifications

Experience level: ManagerMinimum 3 years of experienceEducation: Associates (required)

Skills

Production

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
